description: --- tags: - translation license: apache-2.0 --- ### opus-mt-pl-en * source languages: pl * target languages: en * OPUS readme: pl-en * dataset: opus * model: transformer-align * pre-processing: normalization + SentencePiece * download original weights: opus-2019-12-18.zip * test set translations: opus-2019-12-18.test.txt * test set scores: opus-2019-12-18.eval.txt ## Benchmarks | testset | BLEU | chr-F | |-----------------------|-------|-------| | Tatoeba.pl.en | 54.9 | 0.701 |
model_explanation_gemini: Translates text from Polish (pl) to English (en) using a transformer-based model trained on OPUS datasets.
